description: Sales fact table containing details of transactions including products, customers, sales locations, and pricing.

columns.name: SaleKey
columns.description: Primary key for sales transactions.

columns.name: CityKey
columns.description: Foreign key referencing the sales city.

columns.name: CustomerKey
columns.description: Foreign key referencing the customer.

columns.name: BillToCustomerKey
columns.description: Foreign key referencing the customer billed for the sale.

columns.name: StockItemKey
columns.description: Foreign key referencing the stock item sold.

columns.name: InvoiceDateKey
columns.description: Date when the invoice was issued (datetime).

columns.name: DeliveryDateKey
columns.description: Date when the product was delivered (datetime).

columns.name: SalespersonKey
columns.description: Foreign key referencing the salesperson responsible for the sale.

columns.name: WWInvoiceID
columns.description: Warehouse and wholesale invoice identifier.

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Description of the product sold.

columns.name: Package
columns.description: Type of packaging for the product.

columns.name: Quantity
columns.description: Number of items sold in the transaction.

columns.name: UnitPrice
columns.description: Price per unit of the product.

columns.name: TaxRate
columns.description: Applicable tax rate (percentage).

columns.name: TotalExcludingTax
columns.description: Total amount for the sale before taxes.

columns.name: TaxAmount
columns.description: Tax amount applied to the transaction.

columns.name: Profit
columns.description: Profit generated from the sale.

columns.name: TotalIncludingTax
columns.description: Total amount for the sale including taxes.

columns.name: TotalDryItems
columns.description: Total count of dry items in the transaction.

columns.name: TotalChillerItems
columns.description: Total count of chiller items in the transaction.

columns.name: LineageKey
columns.description: Key used for tracking data lineage.

columns.name: Year
columns.description: Transaction year (e.g., 2000).

columns.name: Quarter
columns.description: Transaction quarter (1-4).

columns.name: Month
columns.description: Transaction month (1-12).
